detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle section at the front, long sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Seam at the waist with a decorative bow and a flared skirt.

Ankle-length kaftan in softly draping, jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen. Round neckline with gathers to create soft draping, an opening with narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Trainers with imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a soft, fine knit with a wide foldover at the top and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Gently tailored blouse in a cotton weave with a tie at the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.
Fine-knit sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot.

Sports tops in functional fabric with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a wide, ribbed hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Suede court shoes with open sides and pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with an appliqué on the front.
Wrap dress woven in soft, patterned satin with a flounce-trimmed V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Seam and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather with a narrow, braided shoulder strap, a zip at the top and rows of fringing. Lined, Size 15x18 cm.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in cotton seersucker with an open, wrapover back with a concealed fastening at the top and ties at the hem. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and roll edges at the neckline and opening.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting trousers in soft fleece with covered elastication at the waist and hems.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, sleeveless, one-shoulder dress in pleated chiffon. One shoulder strap with faceted plastic stones,a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Metal earrings with one hoop-shaped pendant and one rod-shaped pendant. Length 3.5 cm.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Unlined.
Ankle boots with a visible zip, decorative studs on the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 4.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front. Narrow shoulder straps, a frill around the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and jersey leggings. Top with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and short slits in the sides. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck at the front and long sleeves. Fastening with narrow ties.
Shirt in checked cotton twill with a drawstring hood, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, airy viscose twill with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with an A-line top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow trims. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Mesh-knit trainers with imitation leather details, a soft, stretchy edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Cap in a cotton weave with an embroidered emblem on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Unlined.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a button placket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Blouse in an airy, textured chiffon weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Relaxed-fit slipover in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a deep V-neck and straight hem with angled slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Shopper in supple imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 17x28x32.5 cm.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist with decorative buttons at the sides, concealed zip in one side and slim legs.
Short jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with hard-worn details, a ribbed neckline and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and fixed lacing at the sides.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with frills at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and tapered legs.
Short, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with wrapover draping at the front.
Jersey sports top with a print motif on the front and narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the hem.
Loafers in soft imitation leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, padded hood and a zip and wind flap with concealed fasteners down the front. Discreet handwarmer pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap front pockets with a concealed fastener. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Set with a bodysuit, shorts and hat in organic cotton jersey. Printed bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Hat with an all-over print.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned seersucker with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs that have adjustable buttoning. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with a seam at the hem. Sewn-in V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, contrasting colour zip and concealed, zipped pockets at the front. Elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia motif, padded antlers on top and a nose at the front.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a deep V-neck front and back that is trimmed with a voluminous, double-layered flounce in crisp cotton poplin.
